name.ch: 人工智能及3R器官晶片技術

department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch:
配合教育部「大專院校動物替代技術人才培育計畫」中心學校 (國立中興大學) 開課要求。AI 智能科技已被廣泛應用於生物醫學領域，本課程將首先探討如何運用 AI 技術，包括影像學技術和模擬疾病的人工智能工具來輔助治療多種醫療問題，如組織損傷、器官衰竭及先天性異常等。課程的第二部分將簡明介紹結合 AI 的當代組織工程在生物醫學產業的
進展，從細胞生理和分子生物學的基礎知識出發，逐步探索到更高階的組織工程議題，如轉基因小鼠和幹細胞培養等前沿技術。特別強調的是，微流體器官晶片技術如何在實驗動物的 3R 替代策略中發揮作用。此外，課程將帶領學生參與 3D 列印和器官晶片系統的應用實踐，並在暑假期
間與企業和研究機構合作，支援學生的實習，使他們能夠學習如何利用當前最先進的組織工程技術來製造具有類似人體器官生理和生化特性的生物晶片。
goal.en: In accordance with “MOE Talent Cultivation Project for Alternative Animal Techniques in Tertiary Education,“ courses are being offered by central institutions (NCHU). This course incorporates AI technologies that are widely applied in biomedical sciences. The course initially explored the application of AI, including imaging techniques and artificial intelligence tools for simulating diseases, to assist in treating various medical issues, such as tissue damage, organ failure, and congenital anomalies. The second part of the course provides a concise introduction to contemporary tissue engineering combined with AI in the biomedical industry. It starts with basic knowledge of cell physiology and molecular biology, gradually advancing to sophisticated topics in tissue engineering such as transgenic mice and stem cell cultures, focusing particularly on how microfluidic organ-on-a-chip technologies contribute to 3R (Replacement, Reduction, and Refinement) alternatives to animal experiments. Furthermore, the course involves students in practical applications of 3D printing and organ chip systems, collaborating with enterprises and research institutions during the summer to support internships, and enabling students to learn how to use the most advanced tissue engineering technologies to create biologically functional chips that mimic human organ physiological and biochemical properties.

outline.ch:
1. 課程簡介及 AI 導論
2. AI 智慧科技之學理基礎 (I ＆II)
3. AI 影像科技技術於生醫產業之應用 (I＆ II)
4. 組織工程基本原理 (I ＆ II)
5. 組織工程基本原理 (III ＆ IV)
6. 生物 3D 列印在組織工程應用暨實習 (研毅企業有限公司)
7. 微流體技術建構器官晶片之技術與在 3R 之應用 (I ＆ II)
8. 多重器官晶片在動物替代技術之應用暨實習 (博克科技有限公司)
9. 基因轉殖小鼠 (I ＆ II)
10. 基因剔除小鼠 (I ＆ II)
11. 發育生物學 (I ＆ II ＆ III)
12. 幹細胞在生醫產業之應用
13. 動物替代科技檢測相關儀器應用暨實習 (國家衛生研究院)
outline.en:
1. Course Introduction and overview of AI
2. Theoretical Foundations of AI Smart Technologies (I ＆ II)
3. Applications of AI Imaging Technologies in the Biomedical Industry (I
＆ II)
4. Basic Principles of Tissue Engineering (I ＆ II)
5. Basic Principles of Tissue Engineering (III ＆ IV)
6. Applications and Internship of Biological 3D Printing in Tissue
Engineering (Antec Biosciense Inc.)
7. Microfluidic Technology for Organ-on-a-Chip Construction and its
Application in the 3Rs (I ＆ II)
8. Application and Internship of Multi-Organ Chips as Alternatives to
Animal Testing (J ＆ H Technology Co., Ltd)
9. Transgenic Mice (I ＆ II)
10. Gene Knockout Mice (I ＆ II)
11. Developmental Biology (I ＆ II ＆ III)
12. Applications of Stem Cells in the Biomedical Industry
13. Application and Internship of Alternative Animal Technology Testing
Equipment (National Health Research Institutes)

instructMethod.ch:
講授
研討
實習/實驗

gradMethod.ch:
課堂表現   20 ％
作業          40 ％
出席率      40 ％

flexDiscription.ch: 除了第1~16週課程外，另以彈性教學方式規劃第17、18週教學活動。
flexDiscription.en: Flexible teaching activities will be applied on 17th and 18th weeks.

ch.competencies: 醫學工程與臨床問題締合

en.competencies: Combination of medical engineering and clinic problems

ch: 學制:限碩士班、博士班。學院:限生醫理工學院。
en: Type:Master's Program、Doctoral Program only.Faculty:College of Health Sciences and Technology only.
